Name: Sokocat - Islands
About the game: A relaxing minimalist Sokoban-style puzzle. You have to push the stone blocks to their right positions on the island, you can use bridges to reach the next island or elevators to go up and down hills. • Simple and intuitive gameplay. • Peaceful and relaxing music. • Play it on beautiful tropical islands. • 50 challenges from easy to hard. • Achievements! • Control a fluffy cat.
